articles.title: Govinda, wife Sunita and Mahabharat actors attend Gufi Paintal's prayer meet; Photos - Indiatimes.com
articles.description: Gufi Paintal, who played the role of Shakuni Mama in Mahabharat, passed away on June 5. His prayer meet was held on Thursday (June 8) in the presence of his family and friends from the industry.
